FailureHandler
@Immutable
public class CrashEarlyFailureHandler
extends Object
implements FailureHandler

Used with SingleThreadedActors to fail the test when an actor throws an exception.

Method Detail

uncaughtException

public void uncaughtException(Object actor,
                              Object message,
                              Throwable exception)
Description copied from interface: FailureHandler
Should log the exception and possibly do some error recovery.

May stop the actor thread by interrupting the current thread. Otherwise the actor thread (and all actors in it) will keep on processing messages.

Should not throw any exceptions - that would result in implementation specific behaviour.

Specified by:
uncaughtException in interface FailureHandler
